sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar app>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-toolbar-title>Application</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app>
      <v-list dense>
        <v-list-item
          v-for="(item, i) in items"
          :key="i"
          :value="item"
          :to="item.link"
          link
          active-color="primary"
        >
          <template v-slot:prepend>
            <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
          </template>
          <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title"></v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <v-row>
          <v-col cols="3">
            <v-card>
              <v-card-title>
                <v-list-item>
                  <v-list-item-content>
                    <v-list-item-title>
                      ITLaguna
                    </v-list-item-title>
                    <v-list-item-subtitle>
                      Proyecto Pila Completa 1
                    </v-list-item-subtitle>
                  </v-list-item-content>
                </v-list-item>
              </v-card-title>
              <v-card-text>
                <!-- Contenido del nav lateral -->
              </v-card-text>
            </v-card>
          </v-col>
          <v-col cols="9">
            <router-view></router-view>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    drawer: null,
    items: [
      { title: 'Inicio', icon: 'mdi-home', link: '/' },
      { title: 'Añadir post', icon: 'mdi-note-plus', link: '/add-post' },
      { title: 'Acerca De', icon: 'mdi-help-box', link: '/about' },
    ],
  }),
};
</script>

<style>
/* Ajustar el espacio entre el v-app-bar y el v-navigation-drawer */
.v-navigation-drawer {
  margin-top: 64px;
}

/* Ajustar el tamaño del v-navigation-drawer */
.v-navigation-drawer .v-list-item {
  min-height: 48px;
}

/* Ajustar el espacio entre el nav lateral y el contenido principal */
.v-main {
  margin-left: 64px;
}
</style>
